recipes: I have excellent reasons not to contact anyone from my old life. But that might yet change.
FNORD [I can call on an Hour of the Mansus to exalt my duel with the Foe into something eternal - but only if I have fought my Foe to a standstill by dealing them six grievous Wounds]
FNORD [If I have seven Defiance Marks, I can call on an Hour of the Mansus to exalt my duel with the Foe into something eternal.]
My Foe already knows exactly where I am.
I've already sent my Foe a weapon.
I could tell them where I am. Or even send them a gift.
My writing on the envelope is crisp and firm. My hand does not shake.
They will be here very soon. Perhaps they already are. [Your Defiance is fiercer now.]
I'll give them a weapon they might use against me. I have my reasons.
Perhaps they'll open the package. Perhaps they'll think it's a trap, and have someone else do it. Will they curse me? Or will they laugh? [Your Defiance is fiercer now.]
I  might need to leave in a hurry. I can prepare the way by sending funds ahead to a possible destination. Of course, if I never go there, the funds will be lost.
I  might need to leave in a hurry. I can prepare the way by sending funds ahead to a possible destination. Of course, if I never go there, the funds will be lost.
It's done. If I need to run, I might have a softer landing.
Once I arrive at this place, I can retrieve the cash I sent ahead.
I should retrieve the cash I sent ahead.
[If your Obscurity reaches 7, you cam send a taunting message to your reckoner Foe before you disappear forever.]

@#npc.smuggler|FNORD A meeting with Giorgiou.
#npc.huntress|A meeting with Chaima, the Snare.
#|U MET A SOMEONE@

@#npc.smuggler|FNORD Giorgiou has a plan.
#npc.huntress|Lalla Chaima wants to kill the beast. FNORD
#|U MET A SOMEONE@
You might call this place the edge of the world.
I'll make discreet enquiries about other cities. [This allows you to find a place to flee to - but there is a small risk of Traces. Worse, the reckoners might get there before you.]

I'll have to take the first chance that presents itself. I might end up anywhere.
All the roads from here are long. It'll be expensive to find another place to run.
I'll need cash to pay my sources, if I'm to find another place to run.
